About

IU
Birth Date: May 16, 1993

Fanpage

This is a fanpage dedicated to Lee Ji-eun (Hangul:이지은/I Ji-eun), known by her stage name IU (Hangul:아이유/Aiyu) is a South Korean singer, songwriter, soloist and actress under EDAM Entertainment. I was first introduced to IU through a Korean drama, Dream High. After seeing her act in another drama, Hotel del Luna, where she played the role of Jang Man Wol, that was when I admired her more as a fan. In addition to her acting, I was fasinated by her vocal abilities and find her voice to be very soothing to the ears. I began listening to her songs on repeat back in 2019. Some of my favorite songs are "Blueming", "Celebrity", "Palette", and "Eight". Every time I listen to her songs, it brings my mood up and I also listen to some of the more slower songs, like "Through The Night", "Knee", "Last Ending Scene", and "Love Poem" at night to help me go to sleep. I am hoping that one day I can go to one of her live concerts.

Background

IU debuted on September 18, 2008 only at the age of fifteen with her mini-album Lost and Found. When Good Day, the lead single of her mini album Real, was released in 2010, she got immediate fame and became one of the most famous and respected idols, most especially in Korea.

Nine years after her debut, IU finally gave a name to her fanbase, Uaena. “You”(U) is from English, “ae”(爱) is Sino-Korean for “love”, and “na”(나) is Korean for “me”. IU's fancafe used to be called Uaena and over time, IU fans were called uaenas.

Discography

Studio albums: Growing Up (2009) Last Fantasy (2011) Modern Times (2013) Modern Times - Epilogue (repackage) (2013) Palette (2017) Lilac (2021)
Mini albums(Korean): Lost and Found (2008) IU...IM (2009) Real (2010) Chat-shire (2015) Love Poem (2019)
Mini albums(Japanese): I□U (2011) Can You Hear Me? (2013)
Best albums(Taiwanese): Smash Hits (2015) Smash Hits 2 – The Stories Between U & I (2018)
Remake albums A Flower Bookmark (2014) Kkot-Galpi #2 : A Flower Bookmark (2017)
Singles(Korean): "Real+" (2011) "Spring of a Twenty Year Old" (2012)
Singles(Japanese): "Good Day" (2012) "You & I" (2012) "Monday Afternoon" (2013)
Digital singles "Nagging" (2010) "Peach" (2012) "Heart" (2015) "Through the Night" (2017) "Autumn Morning" (2017) "Bbibbi" (2018) "Love Poem" (2019) "Eight" (2020) "Celebrity" (2021)
Collaborations "Telecinema Project Vol.6" (2010) "Love Request" (with Yoo Seung Ho) (2010) "It's You" (with Sung Si Kyung) (2010) "Ice Flower" (with Kim Yuna) (2011) "Not Spring, Love, or Cherry Blossoms" (with HIGH4) (2014) "Summer Love" (with Ulala Session) (2014) "Sogyeokdong" (2014) "Can't Love You Anymore" (with Oh Hyuk) (2017) "First Winter" (with Sung Si Kyung) (2019)
OSTs "Dream High OST Part.1" ("Someday") (2011) "The Greatest Love OST Part.4" ("Hold My Hand") (2011) "Crash Landing on You OST Part.11" ("Give You My Heart") (2020) "I-LAND OST" ("Into the I-LAND") (2020)

Filmography

Movies: Sammy's Adventures 2 (2012)[voice] Real (2017)[cameo] Persona (2019) Shades of the Heart (2019) Dream (2020)
Dramas: Dream High (KBS2, 2011) Dream High 2 (KBS2, 2012)[cameo] Salamander Guru and the Shadows (SBS, 2012)[cameo] Lee Soon Shin is the Best (KBS2, 2013) Beautiful Man (KBS2, 2013) The Producers (KBS2, 2015) Moon Lovers: Scarlet Heart Ryeo (SBS, 2016) My Mister (tvN, 2018) Hotel del Luna (tvN, 2019)
Music video appearances: K.Will - "My Heart is Beating" (2011)
Epik High - "Lovedrunk" (feat. Crush) (2019)
